channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: ASCE to Hold Student Chapter Meeting September 24
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM - This week’s meeting will feature guest speaker Erin Marion from Colliers Engineering & Design. Bring your resume and prepare for the Career Fair while socializing with fellow students and enjoying some pizza!
item.author: Students

item.title: “Coffee & Art” Sessions Continue September 24
item.description: Date: Tuesday, September 24, 2024 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - To be held in the Mueller Center classroom, this creative and social event gives students a chance enjoy a variety of coffee options while participating in different arts-and-crafts activities in a relaxed atmosphere. Stop by to unwind, connect with peers, and engage in creative hands-on projects!
item.author: Students

item.title: “Wellness Wednesday” Series to Continue September 25
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM - A program dedicated to enhancing student health and wellbeing, Wellness Wednesdays offer a diverse range of activities and information sessions that focus on crucial life skills and aim to equip students with practical knowledge for maintaining physical, mental, and financial wellness throughout their college journey and beyond.
item.author: Students

item.title: “Lift & Learn” Fitness/Nutrition Session to be Held September 25
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:30 PM - In this fitness and nutrition program, led by our experienced strength and conditioning coach, participants engage in guided workout sessions tailored to various fitness levels and will learn about proper nutrition to support their fitness goals. The combination of practical exercise and nutritional education empowers students to develop healthy habits, optimize their workouts, and understand the link between physical activity and diet.
item.author: Students

item.title: OGE Online Workshop to Offer Tips for Dissertation, Thesis Preparation and Submission
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 12:00 PM - 1:30 PM - This workshop will discuss the basics of correct thesis organization and format, appropriate paper attribution and reference citation styles, and review the most common mistakes and ways to avoid them. All students who will be writing a thesis or dissertation are welcome to register and get their questions ready!
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD Announces September 24 Resume Review/Tabling Session with RPI Alumni
item.description: Anytime between 1:00PM and 3:00PM on Tuesday, September 24 in the 15th Street welcome lobby of the Rensselaer Union, students are welcome to stop by to connect with Gore associates who graduated from RPI and have their resume reviewed in between classes! Company associates will also offer career advice, share their experiences from post graduation, and highlight what it’s like to work in the industry.
item.author: Students

item.title: BMED/BMDS Co-Terminal Info Session Scheduled for September 25
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 9:00 AM - 10:00 AM - Please send an email request for an invitation to the WebEx information session about the co-terminal Master’s programs in Biomedical Engineering and Biomedical Data Science.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Student Food Pantry Now Available
item.description: Date: Monday, September 23, 2024 12:00 AM - Located in the East Campus Class Community Center, Rensselaer’s food pantry offers non-perishable items to help supplement any student’s primary food source. Please refer to Student Success’ “RPI Student Food Pantry” webpage for pantry hours and ways you can donate!
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD: RPI Alumni Session, Q&A with MathWorks to be Held September 25
item.description: From 6:30PM to 8:00PM on September 25 in DCC 337, RPI alum Noah Prisament will discuss his journey as an Intern and Engineer in MathWorks’ Engineering Development Group, and how he gained hands-on experience at the company; he will also answer questions. Please register on Handshake and submit MathWorks’ registration form.
item.author: Students

item.title: Check Out the Bicentennial Drone Show on September 27!
item.description: Date: Friday, September 27, 2024 8:00 PM - Come to the East Campus Athletic Village at sunset for an unforgettable experience as we take RPI’s legacy to the sky with our Bicentennial Drone Show, which will celebrate RPI’s past, reflect on the present, and look to the future. An RSVP is required.
item.author: Community

item.title: Physics, Applied Physics and Astronomy Colloquium Scheduled for September 25
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM - This colloquium will feature a presentation titled “Distinct statistical characteristics of quantum communication networks” by Dr. Xiangyi Meng, an Assistant Professor in Rensselaer’s department of Physics, Applied Physics, and Astronomy.
item.author: Community

item.title: “Meet Your Faculty Senate” Event Scheduled for September 25
item.description: Date: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM - In collaboration with the Office of the Provost, the Faculty Senate is excited to announce the continuation of its faculty social events, where faculty are invited to gather with colleagues and relax as we all work to tackle the semesters together! Beverages and snacks will be served.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: HelioCampus Training, Resources to Aid Instructors in Adding Questions to SoE Midterm Course Evaluations
item.description: School of Engineering midterm course evaluations will open to the students on October 10 and will close on October 23, with reports available to instructors on October 24. Any instructors who wish to add questions to their courses prior to the course survey opening may do so until October 9; the Office of Undergraduate Education will be offering webinar training sessions on September 25 and October 7 to those who need assistance adding their questions.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Fac/Staff Webinar, “Tips for Improving Online Breakout Room Sessions,” Scheduled for October 4
item.description:
Date: Friday, October 4, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - In this webinar, which will review tips and tricks to creating more productive breakout sessions, participants will not learn “how to” use the breakout room feature in Webex, but how to improve the engagement in such sessions by offering roles, mixing things up, and creating connections. Please register if you plan to participate!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
